generic beam carrying OAM. We demonstrated that the
rms divergence is bounded by the absolute
mean value of the beam orbital angular momentum
(see eq. \eqref{bound}).

relation between the spatial and wavevectors extent. Such uncertainty 
implies an increased beam divergence
and a lower ability in focusing the beam.
